Make waiting-games channel client work correctly when user's own waiting game is joined.

- Add game ID to user_waiting_game partial so that it can be selected as other waiting games are.

- Reload games page when user's own waiting game has been joined so that not only is the waiting game removed, but the now ongoing game is displayed.

commit_list.message: Use turbolinks:visit rather than turbolinks:load to send message of unavailability to play another game when invited user leaves game page, as  message will then be sent sooner.

commit_list.message: Allow users to cancel invitations to play another game (whether explicitly by clicking a 'cancel' button or implicitly by leaving the page); provide for messages of unavailability when invited users do not or cannot respond to invitations to play another game; and change the result of accepting an invitation to play again after the invitation has expired so that the nothing is done (as such an event should not normally occur, given the existence of a client-side timeout).
